title: Blood money
creator_credit: Tom Broadbridge, Chris Oliver and Chris Fitchett
brief_description: Tense thriller starring Bryan Brown and John Flaus. Pete, a professional criminal who is dying of cancer, returns to Melbourne to settle a few scores. He wants to meet up with his ex-girlfriend and effect a reconciliation before facing death. The crime story is presented entirely from the criminal’s perspective. Rated: M
